DOC.brief_summary: To determine anxiolytic efficacy , safety , tolerability flexible-dose venlafaxine extend release ( ER ) administer 16 week treatment child adolescent outpatient social anxiety disorder ( generalize ) placebo-controlled study .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Venlafaxine ER Children Adolescents With Social Anxiety Disorder
